Hotel Cote d'or jouit d'un emplacement i: Hotel Cote d'Or enjoys an ideal location by the sea.It offers comfortable rooms with an extraordinary view.These practical and comfortable rooms are soundproofed and equipped with air conditioning,a modern bathroom, and a television with international channels.Free wireless Internet access is available throughout the property.Enjoy a meal in our hotel restaurant which serve different dishes.The hotel is located near the sea of M'diq, the Corniche, taxis and the mosque.The courteous staff will be happy to help you and will welcome you warmly.
Bienvenue à l'Hôtel Côte d'Or: Welcome to the Hotel Côte d'Or
Notre hôtel est le choix parfait pour le: Our hotel is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a comfortable and affordable stay with stunning views of the Mediterranean.
Nous sommes situés en plein cœur de la: We are located right in the heart of the city, within walking distance of major tourist attractions and local restaurants.
Avec nous, vous pouvez profiter d'un héb: With us you can enjoy comfortable accommodation at competitive rates. Our rooms are equipped with everything you need for a pleasant stay, including a private bathroom, air conditioning, television and free Wi-Fi access.
J'ai passé un merveilleux séjour dans ce: I had a wonderful stay at this sea view hotel. The location is just amazing, with an amazing view of the ocean. The staff were very friendly and welcoming and made me feel at home from the moment I arrived. The hotel restaurant had delicious food, especially their fresh seafood specialty. I was also impressed with the quality of the cocktails prepared by the bartender. My room was spacious and comfortable with a great view of the ocean. I loved listening to the waves crashing on the beach each morning. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing stay by the sea with delicious food and friendly, attentive staff. I am already planning to come back next year to enjoy this exceptional place again.
Notre restaurant est l'endroit idéal pou: Our restaurant is the perfect place to savor local dishes while enjoying the view of the Mediterranean Sea. We pride ourselves on offering fresh and delicious cuisine prepared from premium local ingredients.
Nous sommes fiers de proposer des plats: We pride ourselves on offering traditional Moroccan dishes as well as more modern options to suit all tastes. We source the freshest, highest quality produce from local suppliers, to ensure that every bite is full of delicious flavor.
Notre cuisine italienne est inspirée par: Our Italian cuisine is inspired by the authentic flavors of Italy, with dishes prepared using fresh, top quality ingredients. Whether you're looking to enjoy pizza fresh from the oven or fresh homemade pasta, we have something to satisfy every taste bud.
Equipée de lits confortables, de tables: Equipped with comfortable beds, bedside tables with reading lamps, a desk and chair for working, and a flat screen TV for entertainment. The room also has a private bathroom with shower or bathtub, towels and basic toiletries.
Pour bénéficier, de nos offres , vous po: To benefit from our offers, you can book before more than a week
Retour à la liste des chambres: Back to the list of rooms
DES CHAMBRES ENTIÈREMENT ÉQUIPÉE, DE DIF: FULLY EQUIPPED ROOMS, DIFFERENT SERVICES TO BENEFIT FROM
La connexion WiFi est disponible dans to: The WiFi connection is available in all rooms, as well as in common areas such as the lobby and the restaurant.
Notre personnels veille à ce que toutes: Our staff ensures that all the rooms are clean before your arrival, which encourages them to clean the room well every day.
Lors de votre séjour , notre personnel s: During your stay, our staff takes care of the washing, drying and even ironing of clothes.
Votre petit déjeuner arrive chez vous dè: Your breakfast arrives at your door in the morning, you just have to ask.
Votre confort est notre joie , Lors de v: Your comfort is our joy, during your stay do not think about your luggage, we take care of everything, think about your comfort.
Si vous avez des questions , n'hésitez p: If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us below and we will answer you as soon as possible.
Nous attendons vos avis: We are waiting for your opinions
